comment:
Emilia Clarke is the worst casting. The recasting these days is so far different to the original it's hard to watch...  Again another casting just based on being fanboys/girls or a big name. Oh doesn't matter who plays Reed Richards just get Dwayne The Rock. .  They don't value casting anymore... She does not resemble Amber Heard and to me I can't invest in her. It's an ongoing thing that's really put me off some movies. Maybe the reason why Hollywood is not a strong as it used to be....You tell me how Don Cheadle looks anything like Terrence Howard. 
I've tried but Terminator Genisys and Sin city 2 was the last straw. Who can we get to replace Clive Owen? Oh that guy Josh Brolin he's a spitting image... No he's not lol. comment: You know, "people are saying" means literally nothing until you can tell us either (ideally) exactly who these people are, or (if you need to keep your sources anonymous) how close they are to the thing you're talking about.
